name: Global Conference on Business Management and Social Sciences
content: Experience academic excellence at our prestigious conference with top-ranked journal speakers, esteemed academics, and industry professionals. Publish in SCI, Scopus, ESCI, ABDC. Sharpen research skills in our exclusive workshop. Explore captivating Dubai with Tour De Dubai. Showcase work in GCBMS Proceedings. Compete for best paper and presentation awards. Enjoy complimentary lunch, hi tea, and premium conference materials. Benefit from our seasoned organizer with 25 conferences across 10 countries. Connect with participants from 5 continents, 30+ countries. Expand your network across academic, economic, environmental, and social domains. Join us for an inspiring journey of knowledge exchange and global connections. Don't miss out!
